Title: Almajiri system must end in five years or risk regional collapse — Group
Summary: The Foundation for Peace Professionals (PeacePro) has warned that Nigeria’s worsening insecurity will remain unresolved unless the Almajiri system is decisively dismantled within the next five years . Continued neglect could destabilise not only Nigeria but the wider West African subregion .

Title: Greenland, Denmark set aside troubled history to face down Trump

Title: Sit-at-home: Anambra stops school closure on Monday, threatens sanctions
